snippet.title: Towelket ~ Fury ~ Roppenchu route (no commentary playthrough)
snippet.description:
WARNING: this game contains EXTREMELY graphic and disturbing content. There are copious amounts of graphic violence, nihilistic worldviews and scenes portraying sexual assault (no actual explicit sex). If you are affected by extreme negativity and have difficulty with separating fiction from reality, please steer clear of this game and any footage of it.

Towelket ~ Fury ~ is a freeware, story-heavy adventure/role-playing game made in RPG MAKER 2000 by Kanashimi Hocchikisu.


Towelket ~ Fury ~ is an unfinished game that was developed after Towelket Reverse/6 and 4. The developer Kanao published this build of the game with many unfinished aspects, for example most characters don't learn any special skills.


Chapters:

00:00 - Prologue
03:00 - 1
31:02 - 2
44:20 - 3
01:32:28 - 4
02:06:19 - 5
02:13:08 - 6
02:27:09 - 7
02:35:40 - 8
02:39:50 - Final chapter
02:46:45 - Towelket Fury Roppenchu Ending


Download the games here: 
https://towelket.fandom.com/wiki/Downloads
